title: Noob vs Pro: Zombie Apocalypse
description: Noob vs Pro: Zombie Apocalypse is an exciting zombie game with a fun storyline that awaits you. Go through level after level. Noob lives quietly in his small house in the forest, suddenly zombies attacked the world of blocks! Whole hordes of zombies want to destroy everything in their path. Help Noob and Pro to end them. Kill zombies, and destroy everything in your path. Survive in this challenging zombie!
